page.title: 06HATTON PARK RESIDENTIAL AREA
page.content: Hatton Park is the most expensive residential area of Wellingborough, consisting of mostly large houses built at the turn of the last century. The owners of these houses are economically successful, professional men, such as doctors, lawyers and bank managers, who have reached the peak of their careers. The obvious thing about this area is the great seclusion of each house from not only the roads but also from the other houses; it therefore lacks atmosphere and any sense of community spirit. There is very little traffic or pedestrians and no shops to serve the needs of the residents who have to travel into the town centre to buy their goods, but one can assume that as they all own expensive cars, this poses little difficulty.
